name: Lightbazaar
tag_list: buy-lights-online, outdoor-lights, buy-lamps, home-decor, living-room-lights, bedroom-lights, kitchen-lights, bathroom-lights
description: buy all kinds of decorative lighting pro
overview:
Lightbazaar.com is an online shopping portal where one can buy all kinds of decorative lighting products.

We are a set of entrepreneurs who got into the business of supplying Home, Outdoor and Commercial lighting fixtures in the year 2008 under the name “Shimmer Lamps and Shades Pvt. Ltd.”. In the year 2011 we came upon the idea of getting our stores online and the thus started the journey of Lightbazaar.com.

The focus is on wide range of products from world famous brands. LightBazaar.com is a one stop destination for all your lighting desires. Our collection includes lights to decorate your kids, living, bed, dining and bath rooms. The designs are fresh, attractive and stylish much to our customer’s needs.

At lightbazaar.com, we endeavor to make available the Home, Decorative, Novelty and Outdoor lighting fixtures to all who have the access to internet. It’s our conscience and deliberate decision to host only home and decorative lighting fixtures and have dedicated our efforts to constantly build our catalogue to help bring the best product for the right value.

We believe in providing the best customer service so that our customers have an enjoyable shopping experience. At LightBazaar.com we provide the finest products at the best value with free home delivery and 30 days replacement guarantee.
